answers.answer: HI,Pain following surgery can be because of post-operative adhesions and this needs to be reviewed with your Doctor. Swelling over the body may not be related to the surgery but may be because of other causes. Like diabetes, hypertension, renal diseases or cardiac problems. Consult a physician for an evaluation.

question: i dont now why i have all this pain in my stomach but i too have had a partial  hysto and utheries removed back in 2005. And since then have always had stomach problems. always have left side pain and now my stomach,feet and face is swelling like i'am pregnant but im knot acourse. what do u do.This discussion is related to/posts/Ovarian-Cancer/Can-an-ovary-grow-back/show/190548.
title: ovary regrown
